vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the Edomites living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.36.11;
son of: Eliphaz (H0464);
brother of: Teman (H8487), Omar (H0201), Zepho (H6825), Gatam (H1609), Amalek (H6002H) and Korah (H7141H)
§ Kenaz = "hunter"
1) son of Eliphaz and grandson of Esau; one of the dukes of Edom
2) a brother of Caleb and father of Othniel
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Elifaz, hijo de Esaú; (b)   jefe de Edom; (c)   padre de Otoniel; hermano de Caleb; (d)   hijo de Elá, hijo de Caleb; tribu de Judá
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
基納斯 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "獵人"
1) 以利法之子, 以掃之孫; 以東的族長之一
2) 迦勒的弟弟, 俄陀聶的父親
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
基纳斯 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "猎人"
1) 以利法之子, 以扫之孙; 以东的族长之一
2) 迦勒的弟弟, 俄陀聂的父亲

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.36.42
§ Kenaz = "hunter"
1) son of Eliphaz and grandson of Esau; one of the dukes of Edom
2) a brother of Caleb and father of Othniel

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.32.12;
son of: Jephunneh (H3312);
brother of: Caleb (H3612);
father of: Othniel (H6274) and Seraiah (H8304J); also called Kenizzite at Num.32.12; 1x,14;
Also named: qe.niz.zi (קְנִזִּי "Kenizzite" H7074H)
§ Kenaz = "hunter"
1) son of Eliphaz and grandson of Esau; one of the dukes of Edom
2) a brother of Caleb and father of Othniel

A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.15;
son of: Elah (H0425J)
§ Kenaz = "hunter"
1) son of Eliphaz and grandson of Esau; one of the dukes of Edom
2) a brother of Caleb and father of Othniel
